Go Back Review Name: Very Good Review Description: Pros: - * Cooling is Great. * Indoor unit is very quiet, outdoor unit fan makes the usual noise. Cons: - * Remote is generic and some features on the remote might not work for you depending on the model. Notes: - * If you have a concrete wall and you need to dig a hole be ready to shell out extra anywhere between 2k to 5k depending on the thickness of the wall. * Installation will be quicker if you directly reach out to LG after product is delivered to you rather than waiting for flipkart to arrange it for you.
